text: This spell is made to overwhelm even toughest of opponents, by throwing at them dozens of conjured icy blades. When overcasted it can dispatch even toughest of mongrels.

Non shall pass. This ice wall blocks passage for anyone, being it friend or foe.
Filling field with sharp icy spikes can make traversing it really dangerous.
Sometimes its best just to roll enemies into the ground and who is better for that job than Giant Snowman.
Swirling Snowstorm sweeps away any missiles that are caught inside, making ranged weapons almost useless.
No one can block with his shield everything, thatÂ§s why it is good idea to summon extra magical shields for protection.
Every time ice spell is cast fresh breeze runs through the battlefield.
